TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi XmlSchemaComplexType extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType

summary.span: 將來自 XML 結構描述的 項目依 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 規定表示。

span.span: Represents the element from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

summary.span: 這個類別 (Class) 定義決定元素屬性 (Attribute) 集和內容的複雜類型。

span.span: This class defines a complex type that determines the set of attributes and content of an element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目可宣告為參考型別屬性`complexType`定義結構、 內容和屬性，該元素的項目。An element can be declared with a type attribute that refers to a `complexType` element that defines the structure, content, and attributes of that element. ## Examples 下列範例會建立`complexType`項目。The following example creates a `complexType` element. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaComplexType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaComplexType Example/CPP/complextype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaComplexType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaComplexType Example/CS/complextype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlSchemaComplexType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaComplexType Example/VB/complextype.vb#1)] 下列 XML 檔案用於上述程式碼範例。The following XML file is used for the preceding code example. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlSchemaComplexType Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaComplexType Example/XML/example.xsd#2)]

The component of the complex type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性不是 null，複雜型別可以包含在指定的命名空間中的任何屬性。If this property is not null, the complex type can contain any attributes from the namespaces specified in the .

span.span: Gets the collection of attributes for the complex type.
Contains and classes.

public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaObjectTable ^ AttributeUses { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaObjectTable ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個複雜類型及其基底類型 (Base Type) 所有遵守之屬性的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of all the complied attributes of this complex type and its base types.

value.span: 這個複雜類型及其基本類型中所有屬性的集合。

span.span: The collection of all the attributes from this complex type and its base types.
The post-compilation value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，從所有屬性的組合`Attributes`從階層中每個類型的屬性。For example, a combination of all the attributes from the `Attributes` property from each type in the hierarchy. 這個屬性的值為唯讀。The value of this property is read-only. 結構描述成功編譯來決定完整的屬性組允許的執行個體文件之後，此屬性具有值。This property has the value after the schema has been successfully compiled to determine the complete attribute set that is allowed in an instance document.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AttributeWildcard As XmlSchemaAnyAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得這個複雜型別及其基底型別之 的編譯後值。

span.span: Gets the post-compilation value for for this complex type and its base type(s).
The post-compilation value of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值為唯讀。The value of this property is read-only. 結構描述順利編譯來決定完整的屬性集的複雜型別後，此屬性有值。This property has values after the schema has been successfully compiled to determine the complete attribute set of the complex type. 例如，它可能是`anyAttribute`其中一個基底類型的項目。For example, it might be the `anyAttribute` element from one of the base types.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod Block { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets or sets the attribute.

value.span: 屬性會防止複雜型別用於指定的衍生型別。

span.span: The attribute prevents a complex type from being used in the specified type of derivation.
The default is .
Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指出衍生的型別。Indicates the type of derivation. 這個屬性可以包含下列值：This attribute can contain the following values: |列舉Enum|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`None`|使用所定義的衍生限制`BlockDefault`屬性結構描述，若有的話。Use the derivation restriction defined by the `BlockDefault` property of the schema, if it exists.| |`Extension`|利用擴充衍生的類型無法取代此項目。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| |`Restriction`|無法取代此項目，由限制所衍生的型別。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| |`All`|`#all`.`#all`. 任何類型，不論衍生方法無法取代此項目。This element cannot be replaced by any type regardless of derivation method.| `Substitution`， `List`，和`Union`衍生方法不會受到這個屬性。The `Substitution`, `List`, and `Union` derivation methods are not supported by this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BlockResolved As XmlSchemaDerivationMethod

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得類型編譯為 post-schema-validation 資訊集 (infoset) 之後的值。

span.span: Gets the value after the type has been compiled to the post-schema-validation information set (infoset).

summary.span: 這個值指示在執行個體文件中使用 時，如何強制型別。

span.span: This value indicates how the type is enforced when is used in the instance document.
The post-schema-validated infoset value.

value.span: 預設值為 項目上的 值。

span.span: The default is value on the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得此值從型別本身，或如果未定義類型層級，這取自`schema`項目。This value is taken either from the type itself or, if not defined at the type level, it is taken from the `schema` element. 比方說，如果有限制的值，可以使用特別定義的類型，不是型別衍生自特別定義的類型。For example, if the value is restricted, only the specifically defined type can be used, not types derived from the specifically defined type. 這個屬性可以包含下列值：This attribute can contain the following values: |列舉Enum|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`None`|使用所定義的衍生限制`BlockDefault`屬性結構描述，若有的話。Use the derivation restriction defined by the `BlockDefault` property of the schema, if it exists.| |`Extension`|利用擴充衍生的類型無法取代此項目。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| |`Restriction`|無法取代此項目，由限制所衍生的型別。This element cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| |`All`|`#all`.`#all`. 任何類型，不論衍生方法無法取代此項目。This element cannot be replaced by any type regardless of derivation method.| `Substitution`， `List`，和`Union`衍生方法不會受到這個屬性。The `Substitution`, `List`, and `Union` derivation methods are not supported by this property.

summary.span: 取得或設定這個複雜型別的編譯後 。

span.span: Gets or sets the post-compilation of this complex type.

value.span: 屬於其中一個 或 類別的內容模型型別。

span.span: The content model type that is one of the or classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是與互斥屬性。This is mutually exclusive with the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentType As XmlSchemaContentType
public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaContentType ContentType { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaContentType get(); };

summary.span: 取得包含編譯後值之複雜類型的內容模型。

span.span: Gets the content model of the complex type which holds the post-compilation value.

value.span: 複雜類型之內容模型的編譯後值。

span.span: The post-compilation value of the content model for the complex type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是後結構描述驗證 infoset 中的內容。This is the content in the post-schema-validation infoset. 如果`IsMixed`屬性設定為`true`上`ContentModel`具有類型的屬性`XmlSchemaComplexContent`，傳回的值為`Mixed`。If the `IsMixed` property is set to `true` on the `ContentModel` property that has the type `XmlSchemaComplexContent`, the value returned is `Mixed`. 如果`IsMixed`屬性是`false`，值為`Empty`或`ElementOnly`。If the `IsMixed` property is `false`, the value is either `Empty` or `ElementOnly`. 如果在型別`ContentModel`屬性具有類型`XmlSchemaSimpleContent`，則這個值一律是`TextOnly`。If the type on the `ContentModel` property has the type `XmlSchemaSimpleContent`, then this value is always `TextOnly`. `ContentType`屬性必須具有其中一個下表中顯示的值。The `ContentType` property must have one of the values shown in the following table. |列舉Enum|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`TextOnly`|純文字內容。Text-only content.| |`Empty`|空白內容。Empty content.| |`ElementOnly`|純項目內容。Element-only content.| |`Mixed`|混合內容模型。Mixed content model.|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentTypeParticle As XmlSchemaParticle
public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaParticle ^ ContentTypeParticle { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaParticle ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得包含 物件編譯後值的物件。

span.span: Gets the particle that holds the post-compilation value of the particle.
The particle for the content type.
The post-compilation value of the particle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這`ContentTypeParticle`之後的最具衍生性的型別和基底複雜類型的內容模型已經獲得解決，根據 W3C XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 規格中定義的規則決定。This `ContentTypeParticle` is determined after the content models of the most derived types and the base complex type have been resolved according to the rules defined in the W3C XML Schema definition language (XSD) specification.

summary.span: 取得或設定資訊，決定是否可在執行個體文件中使用 項目。

span.span: Gets or sets the information that determines if the element can be used in the instance document.

value.span: 如果為 ，項目不能直接使用這個 項目，必須使用從這個 項目衍生的複雜型別。

span.span: If , an element cannot use this element directly and must use a complex type that is derived from this element.
The default is .
Optional.

summary.span: 取得或設定資訊，決定複雜類型是否具有混合內容模型 (內容中的標記)。

span.span: Gets or sets information that determines if the complex type has a mixed content model (markup within the content).

value.span: 如果這個複雜型別的子項目之間可以出現字元資料，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: , if character data can appear between child elements of this complex type; otherwise, .
The default is .
Optional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示是否這個子元素之間可以出現字元資料`complexType`。Indicates if character data can appear between the child elements of this `complexType`. 如果`simpleContent`項目是子元素`mixed`不允許屬性 (`false`)。If the `simpleContent` element is a child element, the `mixed` attribute is not allowed (`false`). 如果`complexContent`項目是子元素`mixed`屬性會覆寫`mixed`屬性`complexContent`項目。If the `complexContent` element is a child element, the `mixed` attribute can be overridden by the `mixed` attribute on the `complexContent` element.

summary.span: 取得或設定複合項型別為其中一個 、、 或 類別。

span.span: Gets or sets the compositor type as one of the , , , or classes.
The compositor type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件必須是其中一個下列的複合項：Particles must be one of the following compositors: |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`group`|複雜型別包含參考群組中所定義的項目。The complex type contains the elements defined in the referenced group.| |`sequence`|複雜型別包含指定順序中所定義的項目。The complex type contains the elements defined in the specified sequence.| |`choice`|複雜型別可讓您在指定的項目`choice`項目。The complex type allows one of the elements specified in the `choice` element.| |`all`|複雜型別可讓所有項目中指定`all`項目出現一次或不完全。The complex type allows all of the elements specified in the `all` element to appear once or not at all.| 這是與互斥屬性。This is mutually exclusive with the property.
